title: Business Services

sections.title: What We Offer
bullets: Accounting, Auditing & Tax Consultancy: Comprehensive financial services to ensure compliance and efficiency.
Business & Strategic Planning Consultancy: Guidance to develop and implement robust business strategies.
Project Planning, Monitoring & Evaluation Consultancy: Tools and expertise to deliver projects successfully and measure impact.

title: Professional Courses & Training Services
summary: Industry-recognized training programs designed to equip individuals and teams with practical skills, including PMP® cohort-based coaching.

sections.title: PMP® Cohort-Based Training
paragraphs: Our PMP® training brings together aspiring and experienced project managers from diverse institutions and organizations, offering both in-person and online learning options.
Delivered by expert facilitators, the program incorporates real-world case studies from Rwanda and global contexts.

The program not only prepares you to pass the PMP exam but also helps you build a strong professional network, sharpen leadership skills, and turn your vision for transformation into tangible results.

sections.title: Key Highlights
bullets: Tuition: Flexible, based on required hours
Merit Scholarships: Available for recent graduates and Partners
Cohort Size: Maximum of 6 participants for personalized attention
Exam Support: Guidance on exam registration, venue access, and payment facilitation

title: Why PMP® Certification Matters
summary: Validate your expertise across waterfall, agile, and hybrid methodologies with the world’s leading project management certification.

sections.title: People Domain
paragraphs: Master the leadership and interpersonal skills required to inspire and manage teams in today’s dynamic environment.

sections.title: Process Domain
paragraphs: Gain technical proficiency in managing project scope, cost, schedule, resources, procurement, quality, risk, stakeholders, and communications.

sections.title: Business Environment Domain
paragraphs: Understand how projects align with organizational strategy and adapt to changing business contexts.

sections.title: About PMP®
paragraphs: PMP® is the world’s leading project management certification, issued by the Project Management Institute (PMI). Holding the PMP demonstrates your leadership, competence, and ability to deliver results.
